item.title: Por: David Parker
item.dc:creator: David Parker
item.description: We realised we really wanted to catch a glimpse of what went on behind the scenes of the companies we looked up to. And we thought other people would want to know too.
item.content:encoded: We realised we really wanted to catch a glimpse of what went on behind the scenes of the companies we looked up to. And we thought other people would want to know too.

item.title: Por: Kevin Parry
item.dc:creator: Kevin Parry
item.description:
Em resposta a <a href="https://gen.drbmarketing.com.br/static/primary-and-secondary-school-final-exams/#comment-75">David Parker</a>.
So we decided to organise an event to share these stories. Today, we run monthly Show & Tell events and an annual conference.
item.content:encoded:
Em resposta a David Parker.

So we decided to organise an event to share these stories. Today, we run monthly Show & Tell events and an annual conference.
